item.title: About
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
As a video director specializing in car advertisements, I am driven by the art of capturing automotive excellence with cinematic finesse. From dynamic tracking shots that showcase sleek designs to immersive narratives that highlight cutting-edge technology, I bring a passion for visual storytelling to every frame, creating compelling narratives that resonate with both car enthusiasts and a broader audience.

Services:

Directing
Director of Camera
Editing

Clients:

BMW
VOLVO
HONDA
NISSAN

Contact:

email@email.com

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Miki

item.title: Minimalio-child
item.dc:creator: Miki

item.title: Jeep
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
Jeep

role: Director of Photography
date: February 2022
production: Cars Film

Behind the scenes, our dedicated team meticulously crafted each frame, capturing the dynamic synergy between cutting-edge vehicles and the picturesque backdrop. From precision drone shots soaring above to the meticulous choreography of high-speed maneuvers, this commercial is a testament to the artistry and technical prowess that went into bringing the essence of automotive excellence to life on screen.

Video Captures
